page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT W'BOURNE VALLEY
page.content: Main employment is in farming on the 6 farms. Owners belong to Farmers' Union and the employees to the Allied Agricultural Workers' Union. There are 3 small holdings which are run as family businesses. There are 2 Nursing / Old People's Homes at Whitway House and Steepleton Manor. Between them they employ 25 part-time staff to look after 26 residents. The Manor is not yet fully open. A number of people commute daily to jobs in Dorchester, Weymouth, Portland etc. Based in the village there is a firm of Electrical Contractors and also a building firm. Several houses offer Bed and Breakfast during the holiday season.
